column4: Hi, could someone help me with a dual-boot problem? i tried to install GRUB, but now i cant load Vista
is that really a problem?   (Just kidding)
lol but i need Vista (unfortuantely) for work
I know, occasionally I do also.
so do you know the problem?
put your menu.lst on the pastebin site and we'll see if we can figure it out.
it says the 3 ubuntu thingies, which it did before, and Vista/Longhorn (Loader), but when i press on the vista one nothing happens
how would i do that
the URL is in the channel subject line.
you mean http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org right?
right
so what where do i look to do this (im not very good at computers)
just go to that URL.  There is a box that says "paste here".  Then you click on a button (I don't remember if it says save or submit or ok, but you'll see it).
then your browser will update.  Copy the URL it shows, and paste it here.
no i mean what would i put there, i see the site and what to do, but i dont see what i need to paste
i posted it, my name was am_
are you still here?
you still here?
yes and no, I'm dealing with a client.  I'll be back in a bit.
i have to go now for a few minutes. heres my file thing http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/48490/
i'm back, tell me whenever your ready (if you see this)
